changeSet.author: kzakharov
changeSet.comment: Added the fields to track calculated maternal age
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`parentkit` ADD COLUMN `motherAgeAtEDD` SMALLINT(2); ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`parentkit` ADD COLUMN `motherAgeAtDraw` SMALLINT(2);
changeSet.rollback: ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`parentkit` DROP COLUMN `motherAgeAtEDD`; ALTER TABLE `prodlims`.`parentkit` DROP COLUMN `motherAgeAtDraw`;
